title: Brand new luxury apartment rental one month free
map_address: 1825 N Las Palmas near Franklin Ave
posting_body: Brand new luxury apartment building in the heart of Hollywood.
You will be the first to live in it!!
Zen Hollywood is a luxury 5 star high end community with every amenity imaginable.

State of the art fitness center, game room, 75 foot heated pool, Jacuzzi, outdoor fireplace, outdoor bbq area, business center, community wide Wifi, complimentary Valet and complimentary parking and pet friendly.
We are now offering one month free with a 12 month lease, we are waiving application fee as well as the administrative fee.
Please text/Call Sharon Paulson for a tour today as only a few left.
